data.text: After I said that, I said to myself, “I will climb up into my watchtower,
Then Yahweh replied to me,
In this vision I will be talking about things that will happen in the future.
Think about the proud people of Babylonia!
If people trust in their wealth, they will deceive themselves,
But soon all those whom they have captured will ridicule the soldiers from Babylonia!
Suddenly those whom you ◄oppressed/treated cruelly► will cause you to tremble,
You stole things from the people of many nations.
Terrible things will happen to you people of Babylonia who build big houses
But because you have destroyed others,
It is as though the stones in the walls of your houses cry out to accuse you,
Terrible things will happen to you people of Babylonia who kill people [MTY] in order to build cities,
But the Commander of the armies of angels has [RHQ] declared that everything that is built by people who do things like that will be destroyed by fire;
But in contrast, like [SIM] the oceans are filled with water,
Terrible things will happen to you people of Babylonia
But you are the ones who soon will be disgraced instead of being honored.
You did violent [PRS] things to the people in Lebanon,
You people of Babylonia need to know that your idols are completely [RHQ] useless,
Terrible things will happen to you who say to lifeless idols that are made of wood,
But Yahweh is in his holy temple;
